Text:
Sale and Sharing of Personal Data

In connection with the Services, we may sell or otherwise share or make available Device Data to our customers and partners. Our sharing of Personal Data in this way may constitute a “sale” or “sharing” of Personal Data under the California Consumer Privacy Act (“CCPA”), as amended from time to time.

Pursuant to the CCPA, in the preceding 12 months, we have sold and/or shared the following categories of Personal Data:
Device Data, including geolocation history;
Internet or other similar network activity; and
Demographic data.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: You may also submit opt-out requests and other privacy related questions by emailing us at privacy@placeiq.com. Please include your advertising ID in the e-mail. Additionally, if you wish to control interest-based advertising on apps on your mobile device, you can visit https://youradchoices.com/appchoices to download the AppChoices Tool  and https://thenai.org/opt-out/mobile-opt-out/ for additional information and instructions on opting out on mobile device.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: We use cookies to measure which pages are being accessed, which features are most frequently used, and to understand our website audience. This enables us to continuously improve the Site to meet the needs of our visitors.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Required cookies	Required cookies enable you to navigate the Site and use its features, such as accessing secure areas of the Site and using our services. If you have chosen to identify yourself to us, we use cookies containing encrypted information to allow us to uniquely identify you. These cookies allow us to uniquely identify you when you are logged into the Site and to process your online transactions and requests.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Performance cookies	These cookies collect information about how you use the Site, including which pages you go to most often and if they receive error messages from certain pages. These cookies do not collect information that individually identifies you. Information is only used to improve how the Site functions and performs
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Performance cookies	These cookies collect information about how you use the Site, including which pages you go to most often and if they receive error messages from certain pages. These cookies do not collect information that individually identifies you. Information is only used to improve how the Site functions and performs. From time to time, we may engage third parties to track and analyze usage and volume statistical information relating to individuals who visit the Site.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Functionality cookies	Functionality cookies allow the Site to remember information you have entered or choices you make (such as your username, language, or your region) and provide enhanced, more personal features. These cookies also enable you to optimize your use of the Site after logging in. These cookies can also be used to remember changes you have made to text size, fonts and other parts of web pages that you can customize. We may use local shared objects, also known as Flash cookies, to store your preferences or display content based upon what you view on the Site to personalize your visit.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Disabling cookies\n\nYou may manage cookie consent preferences by clicking on the Cookie Settings button on the webpage footer below. Generally, you can remove or reject cookies via your browser settings. In order to do this, follow the instructions provided by your browser (usually located within the “settings”, “help” “tools” or “edit” facility). Many browsers are set to accept cookies until you change your settings.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: You may manage cookie consent preferences by clicking on the Cookie Settings button on the webpage footer below. Generally, you can remove or reject cookies via your browser settings
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: Changes to This Notice This Privacy Policy may change from time to time, effective from the date mentioned in the updated version of the Privacy Policy. You can tell when this Privacy Policy was last updated by reviewing the Last Updated legend at the top of this page. Please check the Site periodically to review such changes in the Privacy Policy.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: Targeting Cookies\nThese cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Targeting Cookies
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Strictly Necessary Cookies\nAlways Active\nThese cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Functional Cookies\nFunctional Cookies\nThese cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: unctional Cookies\nFunctional Cookies\nThese cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Type of Cookies	Description
Required cookies	Required cookies enable you to navigate the Site and use its features, such as accessing secure areas of the Site and using our services. If you have chosen to identify yourself to us, we use cookies containing encrypted information to allow us to uniquely identify you. These cookies allow us to uniquely identify you when you are logged into the Site and to process your online transactions and requests.
Performance cookies	These cookies collect information about how you use the Site, including which pages you go to most often and if they receive error messages from certain pages. These cookies do not collect information that individually identifies you. Information is only used to improve how the Site functions and performs. From time to time, we may engage third parties to track and analyze usage and volume statistical information relating to individuals who visit the Site.
Functionality cookies	Functionality cookies allow the Site to remember information you have entered or choices you make (such as your username, language, or your region) and provide enhanced, more personal features. These cookies also enable you to optimize your use of the Site after logging in. These cookies can also be used to remember changes you have made to text size, fonts and other parts of web pages that you can customize. We may use local shared objects, also known as Flash cookies, to store your preferences or display content based upon what you view on the Site to personalize your visit.

From time to time, we may engage third parties to track and analyze usage and volume statistical information relating to individuals who visit the Site.

0: Functionality cookies ||| 1: Functionality cookies allow the Site to remember information you have entered or choices you make (such as your username, language, or your region) and provide enhanced, more personal features. These cookies also enable you to optimize your use of the Site after logging in. These cookies can also be used to remember changes you have made to text size, fonts and other parts of web pages that you can customize. We may use local shared objects, also known as Flash cookies, to store your preferences or display content based upon what you view on the Site to personalize your visit.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Changes to This Notice This Privacy Policy may change from time to time, effective from the date mentioned in the updated version of the Privacy Policy. You can tell when this Privacy Policy was last updated by reviewing the Last Updated legend at the top of this page. Please check the Site periodically to review such changes in the Privacy Policy.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: Targeting Cookies\nTargeting Cookies\nThese cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Strictly Necessary Cookies\nAlways Active\nThese cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Functional Cookies\nFunctional Cookies\nThese cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected
